channel.title: Two Things
channel.description:
Based on-PhoneScape
How do I make myself a moderator on my own server, and how do I shut my server down?

item.title: Two Things
item.dc:creator: @Sephiroth1 Sephiroth~
item.description:
@Sephiroth1 wrote:

[quote=“breaking the bridge, post:3, topic:38476”]Quote from Seph:
moderator on server:
go into characters folder
double click on target character
where it says player rights, and a number next to it, change that number

I did the character part but I didn’t see target character …
btw this is phonescape based ;D[/quote]

-.-" man, how dumb can people get…

when i say target character, i mean the character that you want to give the mod status to

Read full topic

item.title: Two Things
item.dc:creator: @niels11 niels11
item.description:
@niels11 wrote:

Lol…
You never heard about playerrights 4 and higher?
it hides your admin crown,but you can spawn and kick and ban at all
Lol

Read full topic

item.title: Two Things
item.dc:creator: @emo-cabbage emo-cabbage
item.description:
@emo-cabbage wrote:

try editing the part where it says playrights = #

Read full topic

item.title: Two Things
item.dc:creator: @Sephiroth1 Sephiroth~
item.description:
@Sephiroth1 wrote:

moderator on server:
go into characters folder
double click on target character
where it says player rights, and a number next to it, change that number

-1 banned?
0 commoner
1 silver crown
2 gold crown
3 server owner

shutdown server:
close the black window that comes up when you start the server

Read full topic
